Coraline

Rank: 253


Wandering her rambling old house in her boring new town- a young girl discovers a hidden door to a strangely idealized version of her life that seems too good to be true.


Director: Henry Selick

Writer: Henry Selick, Neil Gaiman

Stars: Dakota Fanning, Teri Hatcher, John Hodgman

Tags: Adult Animation, Dark Fantasy, Stop Motion Animation, Supernatural Fantasy, Animation, Drama, Family, Fantasy
